p: [(N-2-Hydroxyethyl)(N-methyl)aminomethyl]diphenylphosphine oxide ( 9a): Yield: 95% (0.27 g), pale yellow viscous oil; 31P NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 28.5; 13C NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 45.6 (d, 3 J CP = 5.4, NCH 3), 56.9 (d, 1 J CP = 89.0, CH 2P), 59.5 (HOCH 2), 61.9 (d, 3 J CP = 8.1 CH 2N), 128.7 (d, 3 J CP = 11.4, C 3), 131.1 (d, 2 J CP = 9.0, C 2), 131.7 (d, 1 J CP = 97.0, C 1), 132.0 (d, J CP = 2.7, C 4); 1H NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 2.35 (s, 3H, NCH 3), 2.71 (t, J HH = 5.0, 2H, CH 2N), 3.38 (d, J HP = 4.6, 2H, CH 2P), 3.59 (t, J HH = 5.0, 2H, OCH 2), 7.45–7.52 (m, 4H, C 2H), 7.52–7.57 (m, 2H, C 4H), 7.75–7.83 (m, 4H, C 3H); [M + H] + found = 290.1300, C 16H 21NO 2P requires 290.1310.
